How many people are affected by MYH9-related disorder ?,The incidence of MYH9-related disorder is unknown. More than 200 affected families have been reported in the scientific literature.,GHR,MYH9-related disorder
What are the genetic changes related to MYH9-related disorder ?,"MYH9-related disorder is caused by mutations in the MYH9 gene. The MYH9 gene provides instructions for making a protein called myosin-9. This protein is one part (subunit) of the myosin IIA pr
